Articles.Content: Weep with joy.
Go to the Mun and plant a Seal Aerospace flag.
Abuse kwantum physics (Yes, I went there, Nova please don't get the plastic explosives) to get me a new series of Mass Relays.

First thing?

Have highest settings without lag...
The first thing i'll do when .20 comes out is download it.

I don't think it will come out the 20th day of may, but it would be cool if it did!

It would be cool if .20 came out at may 20, and then .21 the next day. lmao

on topic:

I'm gonna ask this again. will the update break saves? Also how about mod compatibility, are they changing anything in the code that can break mods? If so what kind of mods would break then?

I wouldnt be surprised if they did that actually

@J0hnsmine

It won't be coming on any weekend, or a friday for that matter, I can tell you that. That always ends bad because nobody's around on the weekends except under special circumstances.

Sorry if I'm bugging you, but wouldn't it make MORE sense to release it on the weekend/Friday so the site won't crash? (less people, less lag?).
Not read the changelog, and assume they add multithreading.

First thing I'd do is see how well my Kerbin station runs. 'Cause seriously, I have like four ships attached and its basically unplayable even with max physics delta time. Then I'll probably mess around in paint with flag textures for a few hours.

You should not predict the release date, that would only make things worse for yourself if it does not come out that time.

But I would definitely plant a flag somewhere and start mining and explore new parts.

I don't think there is going to be mining in 0.20...
I'll be waiting for all the broken mods to get updated.

Sorry if I'm bugging you, but wouldn't it make MORE sense to release it on the weekend/Friday so the site won't crash? (less people, less lag?).

I think he meant around their office.

I am totally putting a flag on Mun, then Minmus. Afterwards, it is going to be a race to put a flag on every other planet out there

It would be cool if .20 came out at may 20, and then .21 the next day. lmao

on topic:

I'm gonna ask this again. will the update break saves? Also how about mod compatibility, are they changing anything in the code that can break mods? If so what kind of mods would break then?

I suspect that's when they'll release it, but I don't want to get my hopes up in case they don't
I'm going to send a kerbal into orbit... PERMANENTLY SITTING DOWN
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29596-First-thing-you-do-in-20

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/29596-first-thing-you-do-in-20

Awwww, come on!
Merged similar threads.
Update it.
My plan is to build a grand tour ship, and plant a flag on every planet and moon in the system.

As much as I'd like to say that I'd do some fun stuff, I'll probably just launch a probe to any new worlds (which I think there will be zero, anyway), and maybe land on the Mun with only the seat (I hope they mass less than 800kg)

I will be creating myself a flag design, planting a flag on the Mun.

Then, hopefully with improved system performance, continue to work on my high orbit station hoping the framerate doesn't drop to 1fps when I try to dock a new section.

I would land on the Mun,put a flag there and then land on Minmus and put one there.

Then land at KSC 2 And put one there!

*

Oh My God it's this guy, hahahah!

1. launch kerbal on a seat

2. achieve circular orbit

3. retrograde burn

4. flip to prograde

5. aerobrake

6. ??????
